page.title: 06THE FARMING YEAR PART 2
page.content: protect the silage making machinery. {May and June Fertilizer continues to be sown once every 3 weeks on grazing paddocks.{ {Silage making}begins.This is done with a forage harvester which cuts the grass and blows it into a trailer.The silage is stored in a large concrete silo.In June,after the silage is cut,slurry and fertilizer are put on the fields. {July:-} Fertilizer and slurry are again put on the fields the{calves}are dosed for worms and the second cut of {silage}is taken. { August/September:- } The silage is cut and fertilizer and slurry are again put on the fields.
